name: 楊元森
objective: 本課程旨在訓練學生基本專業設計程式之寫作技巧，及應用現成專業套裝軟體達到輔助設計之能力，使學生能將專業之設計以電腦輔助來完成。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Day off
Week 3: Coordinate systems. Drawing lines.
Week 4: Draw lines using abs. and relative coordinates.
Week 5: Draw circles, arcs, rectangle.
Week 6: Practice on circles, arcs, dimensions.
Week 7: Trim, move, copy, erase, stretch, mirror, rotate, array, text, scale
Week 8: Layer, line types, line type scale, hatch
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Orthographic projection (front/right/top views)
Week 11: Section views
Week 12: Isometric view
Week 13: 3D modeling
Week 14: Government Standard Frame
Week 15: Engineering of a simple house
Week 16: Engineering of a house with windows
Week 17: Final Project Exercise
Week 18: Final Project
